abilities.name: Infiltrators
abilities.description: Models with this ability can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from the enemy deployment zone and any enemy models.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.description: Unless part of an Attached unit, this model can only be targeted by a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: If every model in a unit has this ability, each time a ranged attack is made against it, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: One-man Army
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when an enemy unit makes a ranged attack that targets a friendly REGIMENT unit within 3" of this model, after that enemy unit has shot, this model can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

abilities.name: Like Fighting a Shadow
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Loner
abilities.description: This model cannot be selected as your WARLORD.
